WorkItem.Description:
After running a long optimizing crash, I get a crash in the MSCORLIB with out of memory.  The system still has plenty of free memory (Commit Charge 1477M / 5982M).  I forced the Just-in-time debugger to give me a stack dump with symbols.   Notice the 17MB string size of the log!
Â 
>	mscorlib.dll!string.GetStringForStringBuilder(string value, int startIndex = 0, int length = 17302683, int capacity) + 0x1e bytes	
 	mscorlib.dll!System.Text.StringBuilder.Append(string value = "Full search complete at round = 2") + 0x9f bytes	
 	mscorlib.dll!System.Text.StringBuilder.AppendLine(string value) + 0xd bytes	
 	Rawr.Mage.dll!Rawr.Mage.SolverLogForm.TextBoxWriter.WriteLine(string value) + 0x10 bytes

Comments.Message: To repro, just set the Rawr Optimizer "Thoroughness" slider to the far right, no other options set and hit the "Optimize" button.  100% repro for me.
This is from Version 2.2.0.9 downloaded yesterday.
I know why this is happening, I'll have a fix in later today.
